name: Chromebackdoor
body:
![chromebackdoor](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e2ead4bbaa71159daf2a8b7e5f107849e499eabd/687474703a2f2f696d6731352e686f7374696e67706963732e6e65742f706963732f3339343633376c6f676f6261636b2e706e67)
# Welcome
#### Video
+ [Install guide](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uc4817555Fc)
+ [Binder guide](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-dndxUl5a1E)
+ [Module guide](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BO05H_4TbSE)


ChromeBackdoor is a command & control backdoor for browser extension , he looks like a Botnet operation

### WebPanel
You can control a backdoor with a web panel, he got several functions like ( Browser history, Action listing, tamper rules ... )
You can change source code of backdoor on web panel & create custum payload!
You can look online or offline status on web panel
![webpanel](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/ae248643d3df777ce69ef76bad29ca766ed53e0a/687474703a2f2f7332332e706f7374696d672e6f72672f746932757a793572662f436170747572655f645f655f6372616e5f323031365f30335f30315f615f31355f34365f31362e706e67)


### Python tools

+ **Binder**
You can associate two extension in one with this tools exemple : adblocks + chrombackdoor, it's great for pentesting.
![Binder](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f9e22e7a4edfaab51261c6ee4e2e3b51896cd681/687474703a2f2f696d6731352e686f7374696e67706963732e6e65742f706963732f3732323237334361707475726564656372616e3230313630333034613131303932322e706e67)

+ **LogTamper**
You can check data logged in real time.
![Logtamper](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/6f2bfbb9427adcf1385383855f2fcc6e4cd8aa17/687474703a2f2f7331322e706f7374696d672e6f72672f79776b616f316d76312f436170747572655f645f655f6372616e5f323031365f30315f31385f615f31395f34335f33392e706e67)

+ **Module Inject**
With this tools you can create your module & inject on chromebackdoor!
![Module injector](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/1f25b808ab96ee2876295e6ff5624fa8cbf04b96/687474703a2f2f696d67342e686f7374696e67706963732e6e65742f706963732f3333353933304361707475726564656372616e3230313630333034613138333430352e706e67)

### Module

+ **Keylooger** : with you can recorded keyboard action key.
+ **FacebookMessage (Soon)** : With you can look in real time all message on facebook messenger.
